If this person traded even 63 total trading days, they would have a 40,000 plus return. It is complete bullshit. Trading is the only skill I can think of where people regularly believe that you can get outsized returns with no skill. Think of anything else that requires a lot of skill. How long it takes you to get really good at it? It's not like months. It's literally years and years. Trading is no different. It's no different than being really successful at anything else. And they don't even consider what they're going to do if the trade goes against the against them. And then when the trade goes against them, they come on well, place like Reddit asking for help. And the last thing is focus on building a robust process rather than trying to scale your small account into your future wealth. Because the probability of you scaling your small account into your future wealth super fast is about zero. However, your probability of becoming a millionaire, if you focus on maintaining a really good savings rate, investing your money and growing your income source, then all of a sudden it becomes much more realistic.
